item.title: 科斯拉主导的交易使数据初创公司 ClickHouse 的估值达到 63.5 亿美元
item.description:
雪花的竞争对手已从投资者手中筹集了 3.5 亿美元。【原文：

The would-be Snowflake competitor has raised $350 million from investors. 

】

item.title: 受抵押贷款利率影响，美国成屋待售创 2022 年以来最大降幅
item.description: 上个月美国旧房待售量创下自2022年9月以来的最大降幅，表明春季销售旺季令人失望，因为潜在买家对高要价和借贷成本望而却步。【原文：Pending sales of previously owned US homes last month fell by the most since September 2022, illustrating a disappointing spring selling season as prospective buyers balk at high asking prices and borrowing costs.】

item.title: 亚马逊旗下 Blink 首次推出门铃摄像头，视野更开阔，可进行人员检测
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.）旗下以生产联网门铃和摄像机而闻名的硬件品牌 Blink 周四推出了新设备，这是智能家居小工具市场饱和后的最新产品。【原文：Blink, the Amazon.com Inc.-owned hardware brand known for its connected doorbells and video cameras, introduced new devices on Thursday, the latest entries in a saturated market for smart-home gadgets.】

item.title: 英伟达在华研究设施计划面临两党关注
item.description: 共和党参议员吉姆-班克斯（Jim Banks）和民主党参议员伊丽莎白-沃伦（Elizabeth Warren）要求英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）就其公司据报道计划在上海开设研究机构一事做出答复，称这一决定 "引发了重大的国家安全和经济安全问题"。【原文：Republican Senator Jim Banks and Democrat Elizabeth Warren are demanding answers from Nvidia Corp. CEO Jensen Huang on his firm’s reported plans to open a research facility in Shanghai, saying the decision “raises significant national security and economic security concerns.”】

item.title: 据说沙特阿拉伯财富基金将探讨科技部门的首次公开募股（IPO
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金（Public Investment Fund）正在探索对一家全资拥有的技术公司进行首次公开募股，因为沙特正加大力度为其经济多元化努力筹集资金。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund is exploring an initial public offering of a wholly-owned technology firm, according to people familiar with the matter, as the kingdom steps up efforts to raise cash for its economic diversification drive.】

item.title: 纽约时报》同意授权亚马逊使用人工智能内容
item.description: 纽约时报》公司已达成一项协议，将其编辑内容授权给亚马逊公司在其人工智能平台上使用，这是这家报业公司在媒体与一种新的颠覆性技术斗争多年后达成的首份此类协议。【原文：The New York Times Co. has reached a deal to license its editorial content to Amazon.com Inc. for use across its artificial intelligence platforms, marking the first such agreement the newspaper company has struck after years of battles between the media and a new, disruptive technology.】

item.title: S&P 500 指数上涨，因法院反对关税，英伟达业绩令人印象深刻
item.description: 周四上午，美国股市攀升，原因是美国法院阻止了唐纳德-特朗普总统的大部分进口关税措施，而且人工智能宠儿英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）的乐观财报刺激了风险偏好。【原文：US stocks climbed Thursday morning as a US court blocked the bulk of President Donald Trump’s import tariffs and an upbeat earnings readout from artificial intelligence darling Nvidia Corp. fueled risk appetite.】

item.title: 非洲开发银行选举毛里塔尼亚总统塔赫为行长
item.description: 非洲开发银行（African Development Bank）选举西迪-乌尔德-塔赫（Sidi Ould Tah）为新行长，让一位前开发银行家执掌非洲大陆最重要的多边机构之一。【原文：The African Development Bank elected Sidi Ould Tah as its new president, installing a former development banker at the helm of one of the most important multilateral institutions on the continent.】

item.title: 收购公司 Vista 将以 20 亿美元收购 EQT 的 Acumatica
item.description: Vista Equity Partners 同意收购帮助企业简化工作流程的软件公司 Acumatica Inc.【原文：Vista Equity Partners agreed to acquire Acumatica Inc., a software company that helps businesses streamline workflows.】

item.title: 中国调查食品药品管理局前局长违规行为
item.description: 中央纪委周四发表声明称，北京正在调查中国最高政治咨询机构经济事务委员会副主任毕井泉涉嫌违法一事。【原文：Beijing is investigating Bi Jingquan, a deputy chief of the economic affairs committee under China’s top political advisory body, for alleged law violations, according to a Thursday statement from the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection.】

item.title: 台湾将派代表团参加下周阿拉斯加液化天然气会谈
item.description: 台湾将派代表团参加在阿拉斯加举行的峰会，讨论从美国总统唐纳德-特朗普支持的一个拖延已久的项目中采购液化天然气。【原文：Taiwan will send a delegation to a summit in Alaska to discuss procuring liquefied natural gas from a long-delayed project championed by US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 捷克大选领跑者准备国有收购 CEZ 公用事业公司
item.description: 捷克共和国最受欢迎的政党承诺，如果它在 10 月份的选举后重返政府，将寻求电力生产商 CEZ AS 的完全国有化，以加强能源安全。【原文：The Czech Republic’s most popular political party pledged to seek full state ownership in power producer CEZ AS to boost energy security if it returns to government after elections due in October.】

item.title: 南非央行恢复降息支持经济
item.description: 南非央行重启宽松周期，在通胀保持良好态势的情况下为步履蹒跚的经济提供支持。【原文：South Africa’s central bank resumed its easing cycle to offer support to a stuttering economy as inflation remains benign.】

item.title: 英属维尔京群岛和玻利维亚有望加入脏钱名单
item.description: 英属维尔京群岛是一个重要的离岸金融中心，而玻利维亚则是世界上最大的锂矿藏地之一，但由于在阻止非法资金流动方面没有取得足够的进展，玻利维亚有可能被列入全球 "灰色名单"。【原文：The British Virgin Islands — a major offshore finance hub — and Bolivia, home to one of the world’s largest lithium deposits, are at risk of inclusion on a global “gray list” for not making enough progress to stem illicit flows of money.】

item.title: 芝加哥富豪支持湾区大学初创企业新基金
item.description: 一家硅谷风险投资公司吸引了包括唐-威尔逊（Don Wilson）、迈克尔-波尔斯基（Michael Polsky）和阿什利-杜乔索斯-乔伊斯（Ashley Duchossois Joyce）在内的亿万富翁的投资，为芝加哥大学的科技初创企业提供资金。【原文：A Silicon Valley venture capital firm has lured investment from billionaires including Don Wilson, Michael Polsky and Ashley Duchossois Joyce to fund University of Chicago technology startups.】

item.title: 如果雪佛龙-赫斯仲裁案败诉，埃克森公司将 "照常 "经营圭亚那业务
item.description: 埃克森美孚公司表示，如果它在与雪佛龙公司和赫斯公司的仲裁案中败诉，它在圭亚那的大型油田将 "一切照旧"。【原文：Exxon Mobil Corp. said it will be “business as usual” in its massive Guyana oil field if it loses its arbitration case against Chevron Corp. and Hess Corp.】

item.title: 台湾称美国不顾法院裁决继续推动贸易协定
item.description: 一位高级官员表示，即使在法院阻止了唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁对其他国家征收的许多关税之后，台湾仍在继续努力与美国达成贸易协议。【原文：Taiwan is continuing its efforts to secure a trade deal with the US, a top official said, even after a court blocked many of the tariffs that President Donald Trump has threatened to impose on other countries.】

item.title: 美国经济因消费疲软和贸易影响加大而萎缩 0.2
item.description: 美国经济在今年年初出现萎缩，原因是消费支出疲软，进口甚至比最初报告的还要多。【原文：The US economy shrank at the start of the year, restrained by weaker consumer spending and even more imports than initially reported.】

item.title: DeepSeek 称升级版模型推理能力更强，幻觉更少
item.description: 中国初创公司 DeepSeek 周四表示，其升级版人工智能模型在数学、编程和一般逻辑方面的表现优于前一版本，同时产生幻觉的情况也有所减少。【原文：The Chinese startup DeepSeek said Thursday that its upgraded artificial-intelligence model can perform mathematics, programming, and general logic better than the previous version, while hallucinating less.】

item.title: Telegram 筹集 17 亿美元可转换债券，为债务转换提供资金
item.description: Telegram 从可转换债券中筹集了 17 亿美元，用于偿还现有债务和延长债务期限。【原文：Telegram raised $1.7 billion from convertible bonds that it will use to retire existing debt and lengthen the maturity of its debt.】

item.title: 英国二手车需求激增对汽车交易商股价不利
item.description: 汽车交易商集团公司（Auto Trader Group Plc）股价暴跌，原因是该汽车交易市场谨慎的盈利前景出人意料地引发了二手车需求的增长。【原文：Auto Trader Group Plc shares slumped on a surprising trigger for the vehicle marketplace’s cautious earnings outlook: buoyant used car demand.】

item.title: 花旗的弗雷泽说，特朗普的明确表态将释放 IPO 市场的活力
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）仍然希望，一旦企业和商界领袖对特朗普政府的政策有了更清晰的认识，期待已久的投资银行市场转机就会出现，但这可能要等到明年。【原文：Citigroup Inc. remains hopeful that the long-awaited turnaround in investment-banking markets will begin as soon as corporations and business leaders get more clarity on Trump administration policy, but that might have to wait until next year.】

item.title: 南非拉马福萨成立小组调查种族隔离罪行
item.description: 南非总统西里尔-拉马福萨（Cyril Ramaphosa）签署了一份公告，宣布成立一个司法调查委员会，以确定是否有人试图阻止对种族隔离时期的罪行进行调查和起诉。【原文：South African President Cyril Ramaphosa has signed a proclamation to establish a judicial commission of inquiry to determine whether attempts were made to prevent the investigation and prosecution of apartheid-era crimes.】

item.title: Clearlake 将贷款人黑名单推向极致，取消近 100 家公司的资格
item.description: Clearlake Capital 集团正在测试，它能在多大程度上防止机会主义投资者攫取陷入困境的投资组合公司的债务。【原文：Clearlake Capital Group is testing just how far it can go to prevent opportunistic investors from scooping up the debt of a troubled portfolio company.】

item.title: 欧佩克+准备第三剂石油休克疗法
item.description:
沙特阿拉伯及其合作伙伴讨论了再次大幅提高产量的问题，即使价格下滑、需求动摇。【原文：

Saudi Arabia and its partners have discussed another large output hike, even as prices slide and demand wavers.

】

item.title: 百思买受关税影响下调业绩展望，股价下跌
item.description: 百思买公司（Best Buy Co.【原文：Best Buy Co. reduced its sales and profit outlook as the electronics retailer grapples with tariffs on imports from China, its top source of goods.】

item.title: 亏损飙升，卡莱尔旗下丹尼斯寻求债务重组
item.description: 凯雷集团（Carlyle Group）旗下的运动服装品牌 Dainese SpA 在 2024 年亏损加剧后，正寻求重新谈判债务条款。【原文：Dainese SpA, a sports clothing brand owned by Carlyle Group, is looking to renegotiate its debt terms after losses steepened in 2024.】

item.title: 欧佩克+的实际石油供应增长可能比宣传的少
item.description: 欧佩克+"似乎将在周六再次给石油多头敲响警钟，为全球原油市场增加新一波供应，而全球原油市场似乎并不急需额外的桶装原油。【原文：OPEC+ looks set to alarm oil bulls again on Saturday by adding another wave of supply to a global crude market that doesn’t seem desperate for extra barrels.】

item.title: 朗斯代尔发现旧金山为初创企业提供的福利难以匹敌
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，莉泽特-查普曼（Lizette Chapman）将报道投资人乔-朗斯代尔（Joe Lonsdale）在离开旧金山前往德克萨斯州多年后，重新对旧金山的初创企业产生了投资兴趣。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Lizette Chapman reports on investor Joe Lonsdale’s renewed interest in funding startups in San Francisco years after he quit the region for Texas.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦考虑在没有石油巨头的情况下建设重要的天然气炼油厂
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在国际石油公司提议的开发成本激增到约 60 亿美元之后，哈萨克斯坦正在考虑在卡拉恰干纳克油田自行建造一座天然气炼油厂。【原文：Kazakhstan is considering building a natural gas refinery at the Karachaganak oil field by itself, after the cost of the development proposed by international oil companies ballooned to about $6 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】
